Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}

{3: 'They witness the Red Tide and its projections first hand, then figure out the strength of the mobsters around the ruins. After carefully selecting a weaker group, they beat them up and take their place.'}
{3: 'The next day at dusk, the cocky mobsters somehow show up on the street with more scars and bruises than the night before.'}
{3: 'Forced by a group of scavengers, they kneel on the desolate street and disappear along the Red Tide.'}
{3: 'Despair is spreading like a plague.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: 'If we ever lose hope one day, will you jump into the Red Tide?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "I'll never lose hope. I will spread my hope to everyone else.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "There won't be any fewer desperate people even if you write those chicken soup words all over the planet.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Shrek points at the barrier wall downstairs. Bella already wrote her favorite mottos on it with some homemade paint.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Let me rephrase the question. If the Red Tide really is heaven, will you jump in?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'Nope. Even if that gross mud flow is heaven, those who jump in are no more than biscuits covered in mud.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sneezes a few times then wraps the blanket more tightly around herself.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Even though I know there are biscuits in that mud, I'll never drink it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Yeah, there's enough chicken soup for you anyway.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bella makes a contemptuous grunt.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Have you heard of Population Effect?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'Yep, but you might be thinking about Bandwagon Effect.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Oh, you're right.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sitting on the rooftop, the two silently watch the Red Tide slithering a few blocks away.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "When should we go down? It's getting cold.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Only the rooftop matches my swag as a Cardman Rider.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "That's enough.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bella picks up her blanket and stands up. Shrek quickly follows her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Say, do you think they all jump on this Red Tide bandwagon so quickly because of... Bandwagon Effect?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "I'm not a psychologist. Don't ask me.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Shrek glances at the book in Bella's hand."}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "It's just a placebo.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: 'So you knew!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'But these words are really helpful for me. At least better than that manga stuff that you read.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shrek is about to fight back when Bella covers his mouth with her palm.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Alright, alright. Although supplies around here are scarce and hard to find, we've still gathered enough over the last few days.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "It's getting very late now. Let's wait until the morning to move out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shrek sighs at that statement.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: '...I was hoping to pick up more books here. You know what, the book you tore is Cardman Rider: Legend of Time. Have you any idea how rare it is?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: 'You had to use those creepy names on me!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bella pulls up the musty blanket and turns her back toward Shrek.'}
{2: 'Bella', 3: "Get some sleep. We're leaving early tomorrow.", 4: '1'}
